title: Sins of the Son
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B07HZ1ZL26An unexpected romance is about to change two families forever.For more than thirty years, the Giuliani family has ruled New York's criminal underworld. Now, the ambitious Lombardi family is clawing their way to the top, determined to claim a place for themselves.As the war between the two families rages, two young rivals meet for the first time - and sparks fly. On one side is Francesco Giuliani, heir to the Giuliani empire. On the other, Jessica Lombardi, a new arrival still carving her place in her family's hierarchy.Will their love be enough to stop their families from tearing one another apart?
author: Frank Lucianus
